meanings.definition: A person or thing that breaks something.
meanings.sent1: The breakers in the factory fix broken machines.
meanings.sent2: The breakers at the construction site repair tools.
meanings.sent3: The breakers in the workshop are like repair experts.
meanings.sent4: The breakers in the team mend equipment swiftly.
meanings.sent5: The breakers in the group are skilled at fixing things.

meanings.sent1: The powerful breakers crash onto the sandy beach.

meanings.sent4: The relentless breakers sculpt the shoreline over time.
